post.text: Thank you Bobby Bowden for the intro last night and your support! I hope I can do as well for Florida as you have done! -DJT

comment.author: Aimee
comment.text: Too late trump and file for bankruptcy. You will never win over Hillary.

replies.author: Elizabeth
replies.text: You are right and that's the issue. If you truly think Hillary will be good for America, I feel sorry for you.

replies.author: Jesse
replies.text: You may have to eat those words come Nov 8th

replies.author: Grant
replies.text: continue to support corruption ! it is YOUR choice !

replies.author: Jesse
replies.text: They who choose to walk in the paths of the ungodly shall reap the rewards of corruption. Thus Sayeth the informed .
